text: Ate jadom tuhade kola uha loka a'una jihare sadi bani upara visavasa li'a'e hana tam unham nu kahom ki tuhade upara salama (santi) hove. Tuhade raba ne apane upara rahima nu zaruri kara li'a hai. Besaka tuhade vicom je ko'i galati nala vi mara kara baithe tam phira uha isa tom sa'ada tauba kare ate (apane apa nu) sudhara lave tam alaha mukati dena vala ate rahimata vala hai
